title: A day in the life of a "YouTube Farmer" it's not as easy as it looks!

tasks.task: Conducting daily chores on a farm.
subtasks: Feeding cows.
Jump-starting vehicles using a jump box.
Inflating tires with a tire pump.
Moving livestock with ATVs.
Repairing and maintaining equipment.
Working with electric fences.
Handling farm animals (e.g., dogs, cats).
Managing livestock water sources.
Collecting and distributing hay for cows.
Dealing with high winds and weather conditions.
Dealing with mineral blocks for livestock.
Operating a chainsaw.
Feeding pets (e.g., dog, cat).
Cleaning and maintaining farm buildings.
Driving farm vehicles (e.g., Dodge truck, ATVs).
Managing farm finances and purchasing supplies.
Collaborating with neighbors for services (e.g., fuel).
Dealing with old equipment and materials.
Using electric and solar-powered systems.
Cooking and eating meals on the farm.
Demonstrating farm equipment and processes.
Operating a farm prototype machine (e.g., baler).
Addressing viewer queries about farm operations.
Demonstrating farm equipment and techniques.
Preparing for and conducting a video shoot.
Hitching up equipment for yard work.
Operating a gardening grill.
Documenting work processes and equipment.
Promoting products and services in videos.
